```{r}

#install.packages("mdsr")
#install.packages("RMySQL")

library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
whole_db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname= "imdb")
```

```{r}
getmovie <- "SELECT movie_id AS mi, info_type_id AS iti, info AS based_on, title AS t, production_year AS year
FROM movie_info 
	JOIN title 
	ON movie_id
WHERE info_type_id = 90
AND kind_id= 1;"

getgross <- "SELECT info AS gross, movie_id AS mi
FROM movie_info
WHERE info_type_id= 107 AND info LIKE '%$%';"
```

```{r}
whole_db %>%
dbGetQuery(getmovie)
```
